summary: With mass layoffs and pulled job offers, early-career workers no longer see tech giants as a safe bet.
title: Big Tech Jobs Were Once a Golden Ticket. Not Anymore
detailed_content: THREE MONTHS ON from losing her job, Ana is still in shock. The partnerships manager had been at Meta for seven years when, in November, she discovered she was one of more than 11,000 workers being let go. “I grew up at the company,” says Ana, who asked for her name to be changed to avoid jeopardizing her future career. “I felt safe being there for so long—it was my home.”
author: BY ALEX CHRISTIAN
